long_prompt: A single red and white striped umbrella is open and resting against a vibrant floral-patterned wall, with its handle sticking out at an angle.
A solitary, dark blue umbrella stands open in the rain, providing shelter to a lone figure hurrying down the wet street.
A vibrant red umbrella stands open on a rainy street, while a matching red umbrella is closed and leaning against a nearby lamppost.
negative_long_prompt: Two identical red and white striped umbrellas are propped open against a similar floral-patterned wall, their handles extending outward at slightly different angles.
Two colorful umbrellas are held together by a single hand by a smiling couple standing in the rain, enjoying a romantic walk in the park.
Two identical red umbrellas are positioned near each other on the same rainy street, one open and the other closed, leaning against a nearby lamppost.
